Reviews.Title: Tracfone 450 Minutes & 90 Days of Service
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Everything was fine, but is ridiculous to ship a box with a card in it. Find a way to email the number. Faster, cheaper, and greener.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal cheapest ever.
Reviews.Author: Ruthann
Reviews.Content: This works with my trackphone and I have triple minutes and no problem putting it onto the phone.  Works great!

Reviews.Title: Price was right
Reviews.Author: W. Strang
Reviews.Content: Very good deal at $65.00. Shipped fast. I see the price has gone up. You could get it at Tracfone's website cheaper now. Watch for price drops.

Reviews.Title: No deal with repetitive delivery charges.
Reviews.Author: Lee S. "Lee"
Reviews.Content: When you add in the $4.95 Each delivery charge (I thought they'd only charge it once) even though the cards were all combined in the same envelope, it's NO DEAL. I won't be a repeat buyer! I can buy for the same cost locally or on-line at TracFone.

Reviews.Title: tracfone's best deal
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Patrick Flanery
Reviews.Content: I received the card quickly and it worked great.  Got my triple minutes and used an bonus code online.  Great Deal!!!!

Reviews.Title: unbeatable
Reviews.Author: buschlead
Reviews.Content: You can't beat the price for the card but the box the card came in was stupid.  You could have shipped a pair of shoes in the box.  other than that the card was a great value will absolutely look for in the future

Reviews.Title: I love TRACFONE
Reviews.Author: Ward Martin
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my needs (no need for 2 year contracts). I love it!. It takes my about 5 months to use it up. I don't use the phone that much.

Reviews.Title: Best value for those who do require long legth of service
Reviews.Author: MadDog
Reviews.Content: This card has a service length of 90 days.  I use this card in conjunction with the 365 days card to optimize my usage.  In other words, according to my usage pattern, the 90 days service period is too short for 1350 minutes( I have triple minutes on my Tracfone and so 450 minutes will turn into 1350 minutes after I have installed the 450 minute card ).  Therefore, I would buy another card with 365 days service to extend my service period.  This approach works very well with me so far.  From a cost per minute standpoint, the 450 minutes card provides the lowest cost( around US$0.06/minute ).  Many times, additional bonus minutes are also available if one has the time to look for the bonus minutes code floating around the web.

Reviews.Title: The transaction was smooth and easy
Reviews.Author: Mark Bara
Reviews.Content: The lack of the 5 stars has ABSOLUTELY nothing to do with the seller. It has EVERYTHING to do with Tracfone. Their customer service has gone fro top notch ,to just about the worst imaginable. I don't know if they are over extended with Net10 and Straight Talk but in the last 12-18 months things have really gone 180 degrees. I entered the PIN and promo code and received credit for 450 minutes as opposed to the 1600 I was supposed to receive.  After being held hostage on the phone for 48 minutes the "problem" finally got worked out.

Reviews.Title: tracfone card
Reviews.Author: angel
Reviews.Content: this is so great and so easy to use. you make it so easy to buy.  i will be back again soon.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Phone for a Very Good Price
Reviews.Author: Mary L. Brooks
Reviews.Content: This phone meets all my phoning needs for now.  The price is right.  Easy to use and is inexpensive to operate.

Reviews.Title: Tracfone Card
Reviews.Author: taz taz
Reviews.Content: I do recommend this card to tracfone users its just a great deal. If you have double minutes on your phone this is really a great deal to have, so this is why I gave this a 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Keep this phone card available.
Reviews.Author: alleyoop
Reviews.Content: It is what it is.  A good price and keeps cell phone cost down.  I will buy again when I needed my other phone goes out of minutes.  Keep up the price and I will be back.

Reviews.Title: I am very happy.
Reviews.Author: A. Cline
Reviews.Content: This worked well. Miniute were applied. Bought two, one for each phone.  I got double minutes. I am very happy.

Reviews.Title: Tracfone
Reviews.Author: Regis
Reviews.Content: I have a Tracfone and this is the best deal.  Since I have 2 years of free double minutes, I get 900 minutes for $70+ without having to buy a Double Minutes card.  The minutes don't expire and every card gives you more service days unlike straight talk which takes away your unused minutes in 30 days.  Of course, others might disagree because they use their phone more than me.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: mustangfury
Reviews.Content: this is a great deal when you need to add more minutes but don't need to add more air time.

Reviews.Title: as advertised!
Reviews.Author: Duncan S. McIntyre
Reviews.Content: Good for a gift, you do get the actual card as noted and shipping is prompt. Saved a few dollars compared to other methods.

Reviews.Title: Fast easy buy
Reviews.Author: Dagmar Weschke
Reviews.Content: I like the idea of not having to go out so find it in stores. Online shopping is getting more popular in our house.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEAL!
Reviews.Author: Mac Chad
Reviews.Content: A great deal, especially if like me, you have a tracfone that gives you triple minutes! A real bargain in my opinion

Reviews.Title: A better deal than elsewhere!
Reviews.Author: James T Houston
Reviews.Content: Already have the LG800G phone and needed to add minutes. This is the way to go, especially if you already have 'double' or 'triple' minutes.  Card only took a couple days to arrive!

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: trish cornett
Reviews.Content: more minutes than expected, usually get a 400 minute card. also the price was great. easy to load on my phone, received it quickly in the mail. plus savings which means i actually got it cheaper than on the card!

Reviews.Title: Easy To Add
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Richards "O2B_Free"
Reviews.Content: I just input the serial number into the "Add Airtime" template and it registered right away including my triple minutes! No hassle very easy and I saved a few dollars vs the local Walmart.

Reviews.Title: Very nice price for card
Reviews.Author: Tredden
Reviews.Content: Very happy with price of the card, $69.99. No problems adding card to my phone. Just wish the shipping price was a little lower.

Reviews.Title: Happy minutes
Reviews.Author: stif47
Reviews.Content: Now what can you say about a phone card, it arrived in a flash.. I loaded up with extra minutes and ended up with 1450, so I am happy with these folks.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money.
Reviews.Author: SHERRI 62059
Reviews.Content: Arrived in short time and was easy to input into tracfone. Would reorder as long as price doesn't increase. Happy with purchase and had no trouble at all with it's installation.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: C. Sizer
Reviews.Content: Thank you Tracfone for a reasonably priced system of cellular usage.  I can't justify the high cost of a smartphone and plan, so this will do for now.

Reviews.Title: Need minutes
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I only need minutes, not days of service. I could not find a card with only minutes on the web site.

Reviews.Title: No complaints!!!
Reviews.Author: Greg Davidson
Reviews.Content: No complaints!!! Completely satisfied with the product and company that provided it. I would not hesitate to do business with this company again.

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Peter W. Mischak
Reviews.Content: Price was great. Saved money by buying it here rather than at a retail store.  Had some concern that the card would be activated before it was sent out so that the pin number would be valid when I entered it to add the airtime.  But it was, and I had no problem with the card and I received the minutes immediately after entering the pin number.  The card was packaged well and it arrived quickly and safely.  Thanks for the great price and the great service.  Thank you Amazon.com.

Reviews.Title: what a deal!
Reviews.Author: Sharon L. Scaletta "shearsher"
Reviews.Content: This is a super good deal sorry i didn't order two.... I will keep watching for it to come online again.

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: Elliot
Reviews.Content: I purchased this and redeemed it for the corresponding airtime.  The next day, I found that the newly-added time had been removed from my account, leaving me without airtime.  I do not know why or how this happened.  I could not call Tracfone customer service because I had no more airtime.  I then tried to reach Tracfone online and was given a link to a chatroom to chat with a customer service representative who never appeared.  I needed cell phone service for my job so I switched to Verizon.After contacting the seller on Amazon, the airtime PIN was reactivated, which would presumably allow me to redeem the airtime I had purchased.  However, this happened after I had already attempted to work with Tracfone's (nonexistent) customer service, failed, and switched to Verizon.This product was faulty.  Complaining to the seller on Amazon may solve the problem but Tracfone's own customer service department is futile.  Based on my experience, I do not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Bad service, deactivates phone.
Reviews.Author: Jarrett Oliver
Reviews.Content: I was a tracfone for 8 years.  Never had problems until now. Recently the service they provide is garbage.  Other companies are possibly hacking into their services.  Their own managers and analyzers do not know what going on.  Any phone that you hook up with them with randomly be deactivated and you'll spend hours being on hold to get it hooked back up.  It happened every day for 2 weeks.  Many others are having the same problem.  Do not purchase tracfone!!!!!!!  Think about it, I myself just lost three job interviews cause I can't get my number back.  This can happen to you!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: No complaints . . . all good!
Reviews.Author: Being Honest
Reviews.Content: This card was purchased as a gift so I waited to respond until the gift was given and installed.  There were no problems in getting the units loaded on the phone.  Delivery was prompt, order was filled perfectly, and the 450 units were doubled immediately upon loading on the phone.  No complaints . . . all good!

Reviews.Title: wrong price
Reviews.Author: LOIS
Reviews.Content: No one will ever buy this tracfone for 99.99 and they see 79.99 printed in bold numbers on the front of the card.

Reviews.Title: AVOID TRACFONE: WORLD'S MOST CUSTOMER-CONTEMPTUOUS COMPANY : where is "ZERO stars" ?
Reviews.Author: flagday1960
Reviews.Content: Wanted to use diff't cc online. Click on "Edit"  next to the cc info. You'd think... No, the cc info is de-highlighted. Try to submit a "trouble ticket". Impossible. One screen only has two links: "Yes" and "No". I guess it's like Jeopardy: you have to divine the question. Got 3 codes, 3 different times. One worked (some diagnostic) but nothing happ'd. Two more got me "Error: (17)" / IMPOSSIBLE TO ADD MIN. ON THE DAMNED WEBSITE - AGAIN!! Go to a land line. Know what? If you call their website "stupid" they'll hang up on you. So will they if you start calling it "splendid". For the 2nd time, it took me an excessive amt. of time (REPEATED FAILURES) to get min. added OVER THE PHONE (landline). I hate their damnable piece of crap website. After its frequent failures, it will tell you "Call 1-800-[etc.]. What DON'T they tell you? They don't tell you: "Hey, if you drive to a landline, and it's after 10pm, the ph. menu will say (eventually): "Please hold for the next available operator", but what the incompetards will NOT tell you is, "No one is here, bec. we're CLOSED". I ONLY learned this after calling in again and choosing "2 for Spanish", where they DO tell you that they're closed. Utter incompetence, and worse? Customer contempt. Once it took me over an HOUR to add min. over the phone. This time? 25min . Absolute contempt for their customers. I'm sure the people who fielded my complaints will get right on those pesky website glitches. The CS lady was a nice ditz: It was as if if I never made the statements I did-- then she'd ask the most dingbat questions. I hate this damned phone about 1% as I hate their idiotic website. The glitches I dealt w/ that the lady assured me would be handled existed 1 yr ago. Oh, to "Edit" your CC info, you do not USE the "Edit" link that does not let you edit, you have to go to some obscure link, then chose some additional obscure link. That's what the Philippines told me. UN. REAL. Absolutely unreal. I hate this company like no other. Could they tell you if you try to call "now" (whatever time it is, you'll be put on hold until the doors open in the morning? Morons and incompetents.
